question: My experience and skills related to these technologies and skills: A/B testing, Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO), data-driven decision-making, Google Analytics, Hotjar, GrowthBook, BigQuery

Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the Data Engineer position at KPMG Belgium. With a background 
in AI, cloud-based automation, and data engineering, along with hands-on experience 
in SQL, Python, and cloud computing (Azure, AWS), I am eager to bring my technical 
expertise and problem-solving mindset to your innovative Lighthouse team. 
As a Senior IT Auditor at KPMG Luxembourg, I worked on data-driven compliance 
solutions, streamlining fund reconciliation processes that reduced runtime by 30%. This 
experience sharpened my data engineering skills in SQL, ETL pipelines, and cloud 
environments, ensuring data accuracy and regulatory alignment. Additionally, my role 
involved DORA, GDPR, and ISO 27001 compliance, requiring the ability to build secure 
and scalable data architectures. 
Beyond audit and compliance, I have developed and deployed fullstack AI-powered 
applications, such as: 
• Crypto & Blockchain Newsletter: A fullstack Flask + SQL platform 
integrating data pipelines and AI-based categorization, which I designed and 
deployed independently. 
• Fine-Tuned LLM for Smart Home Consulting: Leveraging Python, SQL, and 
cloud AI models, I developed an intelligent chatbot for home automation solutions. 
• Hybrid Web Scraper (AI & SQL): Extracted structured insights from dynamic web 
data using BeautifulSoup, OpenAI GPT-4, and SQL-based storage. 
My expertise in data engineering, cloud platforms, and AI integration aligns with KPMG 
Lighthouse’s mission to drive data-driven transformation. I am eager to contribute 
by rationalizing, migrating, and optimizing cloud data platforms, leveraging Azure, 
AWS, Python, SQL, and API-based architectures. 
I thrive in collaborative, international environments and am motivated by solving complex 
data challenges. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my experience 
and entrepreneurial mindset can contribute to KPMG Belgium’s data engineering team. 
Looking forward to your response. Thank you for your time and consideration. 
Best regards, 
Ruiqi Tan
RUIQI TAN 
📍 Luxembourg 
📧 rickytan79386@gmail.com 
📞 +352 661777082 
LinkedIn | GitHub 
 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
DevOps Engineer with expertise in cloud automation, microservices, and CI/CD pipelines. 
Strong background in Azure, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform. Experienced 
in Agile development, infrastructure security, and automation to enhance system 
reliability and deployment efficiency. 
 
SKILLS 
• Programming: Java (Spring Boot), Python, Bash, SQL 
• DevOps & Automation: Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Ansible, 
Terraform 
• Cloud Platforms: Azure, AWS 
• Monitoring & Logging: ELK Stack, Grafana, Prometheus 
• Security & Compliance: ISO 27001, GDPR, PSD2, DORA 
• Software Development: Microservices, OpenAPI, RESTful API, JUnit, Cucumber 
 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Senior IT Auditor | KPMG Luxembourg 
Sep 2022 – Aug 2024 
• Led IT audits & compliance assessments for financial & telecom clients, ensuring 
adherence to ISO 27001, GDPR, PSD2. 
• Developed automated audit solutions, reducing reconciliation runtime by 30%. 
• Conducted risk assessments & vulnerability analysis for IT infrastructures. 
DevOps Engineer | Whale Cloud Technologies (Alibaba Group) 
Sep 2020 – Aug 2022 
• Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines with security automation. 
• Developed Azure-based microservices, improving deployment scalability. 
• Implemented Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) solutions using Terraform & Ansible. 
• Created real-time monitoring dashboards with Prometheus & Grafana.

IT Engineer | HomeSmartify.lu 
Oct 2024 – Present 
• Built an AI-powered chatbot for smart home system configuration. 
• Developed Python scripts for predictive analytics & automation. 
• Designed and deployed an AI-driven content aggregation web scraper. 
 
KEY PROJECTS 
• Deploy Llama2 on Ubuntu VM – Configured VMware, Python, and containerized 
dependencies. 
• FastAPI Microservice with MySQL – Built a RESTful API with OAuth 
authentication. 
• Blockchain Compliance Automation – Integrated blockchain & AI for risk 
assessments. 
• Automated Web Scraper with LLM – Developed a hybrid BeautifulSoup & GPT-
4 news extractor. 
 
EDUCATION & CERTIFICATIONS 
• MBA, Blockchain & Big Data – HEC Liège Luxembourg (Feb 2025 – June 2025) 
• Master’s in Economics – Münster University, Germany (2016 – 2020) 
• Azure Fundamentals | AWS Cloud Practitioner 
• PCEP™ – Certified Entry-Level Python Programmer 
 
LANGUAGES 
• English (Fluent) | German (Fluent) | Chinese (Fluent) | French (B1) 
 
PERSONAL PROJECTS & OPEN-SOURCE CONTRIBUTIONS 
• Fine-tuned DistilBERT for LLM preference prediction, achieving high accuracy 
in Kaggle competitions. 
• Developed a PyQt5 quiz application, integrating PostgreSQL and interactive UI.
Ruiqi Tan 
Rue du Chateau 63, Luxembourg, Luxembourg 
rickytan79386@gmail.com | +352 661777082

Date: 25.02.2025 
Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the AI Strategist / Technologist position at WOO. With over five 
years of experience spanning AI solutions, blockchain technology, and financial services, I 
am confident in my ability to contribute to WOO’s vision of advancing decentralization and 
integrating AI within the crypto industry. 
My background includes leading AI-driven projects, such as developing and fine-
tuning Large Language Models (LLMs) for smart home solutions and participating in 
the Kaggle LLM preference prediction competition, where I successfully fine-tuned 
models to improve user response prediction. Additionally, my entrepreneurial work 
at HomeSmartify.lu involved designing AI-based dialogue systems and automating 
configuration solutions, which required close collaboration with cross-functional teams to 
deliver user-centric products. 
Academically, I pursued an MBA in Blockchain & Big Data at HEC Liège Luxembourg, 
where I received a scholarship for my proposal on leveraging blockchain and AI to address 
compliance challenges for SMEs. This project integrated Web3 technologies and the Ocean 
Protocol to ensure data integrity and cost-efficient compliance management, reflecting my 
ability to blend AI strategy with practical, business-driven applications. 
At KPMG Luxembourg, I developed risk management frameworks and data-driven 
solutions that improved operational efficiency by 30%. These experiences have given me a 
comprehensive understanding of compliance procedures, financial services, and product 
strategy—skills directly applicable to shaping and communicating WOO’s AI narrative for 
fundraising, investor relations, and product development. 
I am particularly drawn to WOO’s commitment to radical transparency and innovation in 
CeFi and DeFi platforms. My combined expertise in AI strategy, blockchain technology, and 
cross-functional leadership aligns perfectly with the role’s requirements to conduct AI trend 
research, formulate actionable strategies, and effectively communicate technical narratives to 
both internal and external stakeholders. 
Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to contribute to 
WOO’s mission and help shape its AI initiatives to drive impactful innovations in the crypto 
trading ecosystem. 
Best regards, 
Ruiqi Tan 
rickytan79386@gmail.com | +352 661777082
Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the AI Consultant (Private Equity Insights) role at Correlation One. 
With a background in AI, large language models (LLMs), and IT auditing, I bring a unique 
fusion of technical acumen, regulatory awareness, and financial insight that aligns perfectly 
with this role. My expertise in Generative AI, machine learning, and AI compliance 
frameworks allows me to provide valuable insights on AI trends, risks, and opportunities in 
private equity investments. 
In my current role as a Senior IT Auditor at KPMG Luxembourg, I have led AI-driven 
compliance assessments, ensuring adherence to ISO 27001, DORA, and GDPR. I have advised 
international clients on AI governance, security risks, and regulatory implications, making me 
well-versed in compliance frameworks like the EU AI Act and NIST guidelines. Furthermore, 
my MBA in Blockchain & Big Data from HEC Liège Luxembourg has equipped me with a 
strong financial and technological foundation, allowing me to analyze AI trends from both a 
technical and economic perspective. 
Beyond consulting, I have actively developed and deployed AI-driven solutions: 
• AI Newsletter Automation: I designed and deployed an AI-powered news 
scraper(Hybride_AI_Soup_Webscraper) that automatically extracts, categorizes, and 
summarizes AI news from global sources, providing tailored insights for decision-
makers. 
• Generative AI & LLM Fine-Tuning: I fine-tuned Mistral-7B to create a smart home AI 
assistant, optimizing model responses through synthetic training data and RLHF 
techniques. 
• Deploying LLMs for Business Intelligence: I implemented Llama 2 on Ubuntu, 
optimizing AI deployment for enterprise applications. 
• AI-Powered Predictive Analytics: I built an LLM-based user preference predictor, 
leveraging DistilBERT fine-tuning for AI-generated investment insights. 
My experience in writing AI reports, synthesizing market intelligence, and advising on 
regulatory landscapes would allow me to deliver clear, strategic, and data-driven insights for 
your private equity partners. Additionally, my strong communication skills in English, German, 
and Chinese enable me to effectively engage with a diverse global audience. 
I am eager to contribute my expertise to Correlation One's mission of shaping the AI 
economy and would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my skills align with your needs. 
Please find my CV attached for your review. I look forward to your response. 
Best regards, 
Ruiqi Tan
Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the ML Platform Engineer position at Synthesia. The opportunity to 
join a team revolutionizing video communication through AI resonates deeply with my career 
ambitions and technical expertise. With over five years of industry experience in DevOps, AI 
solutions, and machine learning infrastructure, I am confident in my ability to help accelerate 
the development and deployment of Synthesia’s AI models at scale. 
During my tenure at KPMG Luxembourg as a Senior IT Auditor, I led projects ensuring 
compliance with international standards like ISO 27001 and DORA while developing data 
solutions that improved fund reconciliation processes by 30%. These experiences have honed 
my ability to manage complex cloud infrastructures and ensure robust, compliant systems. 
My hands-on work with AWS and Azure, combined with extensive use of Docker, aligns 
with your need for scalable cloud solutions. 
In my recent entrepreneurial venture, I developed and fine-tuned Large Language Models 
(LLMs) for smart home dialogues, integrating CI/CD pipelines and managing cloud-based 
deployments. This project echoes Synthesia’s commitment to making AI accessible and 
scalable. Moreover, my contributions to projects like deploying LLaMA2 on Ubuntu 
VMs and creating microservices with FastAPI and MySQL demonstrate my proficiency in 
Python-based systems and infrastructure automation. 
My academic foundation, culminating in an MBA in Blockchain & Big Data from HEC 
Liège Luxembourg, complements my technical background, allowing me to approach 
challenges with a strategic mindset. Synthesia’s mission to democratize video content 
creation, especially for large organizations, aligns with my passion for building user-centric, 
AI-driven platforms. 
What excites me most about this role is the chance to collaborate directly with researchers 
and data scientists. Throughout my career, I’ve thrived in cross-functional environments—
optimizing data pipelines, enhancing model training workflows, and ensuring infrastructure 
resilience. I look forward to bringing this collaborative spirit to Synthesia, where I can help 
streamline processes that underpin your groundbreaking AI video communications platform. 
Thank you for considering my application. I am eager to discuss how my background can 
contribute to Synthesia’s continued success and innovation. 
Warm regards, 
Ruiqi Tan
Dear Ms. Demmerle, 
I am thrilled to apply for the Cloud Architect position at Proximus Luxembourg. With a solid 
foundation in cloud technologies, DevOps practices, and AI innovation, I am eager to 
contribute my skills to designing and managing robust, secure, and scalable solutions that 
align with your business objectives. 
During my tenure at Whale Cloud Technologies, I spearheaded automated deployment 
pipelines by la Post Luxembourg and engineered software development cycle across major 
telecom software projects, fostering efficiency and scalability. My subsequent role as Senior 
IT Auditor at KPMG Luxembourg further refined my expertise in compliance and security, 
ensuring adherence to frameworks such as GDPR and ISO 27001—critical elements for 
designing reliable cloud architectures. 
My technical acumen aligns strongly with the requirements of this role, particularly my 
hands-on experience in: 
• Cloud Platforms: Proficient in hybrid and multi-cloud environments, including AWS 
and Azure, with expertise in designing distributed, scalable solutions. 
• AI and Data Innovation: I developed and fine-tuned AI models, such as the Mistral 
7B, for smart home automation, showcasing my ability to integrate cutting-edge AI 
technologies into practical applications. 
• AI Agent Architecting: My AI-driven compliance framework project demonstrates 
my ability to orchestrate modular AI agents, integrate blockchain for secure data 
management, and streamline processes—skills transferable to developing cloud-
native solutions. 
• DevOps and Microservices: Extensive experience with Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD 
pipelines, and Terraform, ensuring efficient deployment and management of cloud-
native applications. 
Proximus Luxembourg’s focus on innovation and inclusivity aligns with my drive to explore 
emerging technologies and create adaptive, future-proof systems. With expertise in cloud 
architecture, agile methodologies, and AI advancements, I am confident in my ability to 
contribute effectively to your team’s objectives. My strong problem-solving skills, combined 
with a collaborative and multicultural approach, enable me to transform complex challenges 
into actionable, value-driven solutions, perfectly suited to Proximus Luxembourg’s mission 
of delivering cutting-edge IT and telecom services. 
Best regards, 
Ricky Tan

Dear Hiring Manager at Next Gate Tech, 
I am excited to apply for the Data Engineer position at Next Gate Tech. With a strong 
background in data engineering, artificial intelligence, and automation, I am eager to 
contribute to your mission of reshaping the fund industry through intelligent and fully 
automated operations. 
Throughout my career, I have designed and developed scalable data pipelines and AI-driven 
solutions that optimize decision-making processes. My most recent project—a fully 
automated crypto and blockchain newsletter—demonstrates my expertise in building AI 
driven solutions. This system integrates robust web scraping techniques (BeautifulSoup, 
Selenium) with LLM models to categorize, rephrase, and curate blockchain news, ensuring 
high-quality, relevant content delivery. The backend, built with Flask and Sqlite3, automates 
data processing and subscriber management, showcasing my ability to manage structured and 
unstructured data efficiently. 
Beyond this, I have led projects in deploying LLMs on cloud environments, developing 
FastAPI-based microservices with MySQL, and fine-tuning AI models like Mistral7B for 
intelligent chatbots. My work in leveraging machine learning for text embedding and 
classification further aligns with Next Gate Tech’s focus on advanced pattern analysis and 
anomaly detection. If you are interested for my past projects, you could go to my Github page 
for more information. 
Your emphasis on harnessing AI, generative models, and vector databases aligns perfectly 
with my skill set. I have hands-on experience designing scalable data architectures, 
optimizing APIs, and implementing data integrity checks—core responsibilities in this role. 
My proficiency in Python, SQL, NoSQL, and cloud platforms ensures I can build and 
maintain efficient, distributed data systems that support complex analytical workloads. 
I am eager to bring my passion for data-driven innovation to your team. I welcome the 
opportunity to discuss how my experience can contribute to Next Gate Tech’s transformative 
vision. Thank you for your time and consideration. 
Best regards, 
Ruiqi
Ruiqi Tan

To the Recruitment Team at NEOFACTO 
Luxembourg 
Dear Hiring Team, 
I am excited to apply for the DevSecOps position at NEOFACTO. With over five years of 
experience in DevOps, IT security auditing, and automation across telecom, cloud, and 
financial sectors, I bring a unique blend of hands-on engineering and strategic security insight 
that directly aligns with your mission to fortify CI/CD environments in agile development 
contexts. 
At Whale Cloud Technologies (Alibaba Group), I led deployment and configuration efforts 
for POST Luxembourg’s BOSS telecom system, mastering CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, 
GitHub Actions), container orchestration using Kubernetes and Docker, 
and incident/change management via JIRA and SNOW. During my time at KPMG 
Luxembourg, I transitioned into a cybersecurity-driven DevOps role, leading DevSecOps 
initiatives where I integrated security assessments into CI/CD pipelines and aligned 
infrastructure to ISO 27001, GDPR, and DORA standards. 
What distinguishes my profile is my deep focus on automation and AI-driven security 
solutions: 
• I built a Personal RAG system using local VectorDBs and LLMs for secure, multi-
modal data querying—a fully local privacy-preserving solution. 
• I fine-tuned Mistral-7B for configuration dialogue generation, a step toward 
embedding AI agents into cloud configuration pipelines. 
• My hybrid web-scraper, powered by GPT-4 and BeautifulSoup, auto-categorizes 
web data and enforces compliance logic for newsletter pipelines—demonstrating 
LLM-enhanced automation in real-world use cases. 
Your emphasis on tools like Fortify, SonarQube, Checkmarx, and processes like SAST, 
SCA, and CIS Benchmarkingresonates with my current practices. I’ve also worked 
extensively with Terraform for IaC, and applied real-time monitoring stacks (Prometheus, 
Grafana, ELK) in production environments, achieving security and observability goals. 
What draws me most to NEOFACTO is your culture of innovation and community—between 
your Neo’vations and afterworks, it’s clear you value creativity and collaboration as much as 
technical excellence. I’d be proud to contribute my mix of technical rigor, security-first 
mindset, and entrepreneurial flair to the Neo'Squad. 
Thank you for considering my application. I would welcome the chance to discuss how I can 
support your clients and internal teams in elevating DevSecOps maturity. 
Warm regards, 
Ruiqi Tan
Ruiqi Tan 
Rue du Chateau 63, Luxembourg, Luxembourg

Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the Senior Software Engineer – Generative AI position at Elastic. 
With over five years of software development and AI/ML engineering experience, I bring 
a blend of technical expertise, problem-solving ability, and a commitment to delivering user-
focused solutions. Elastic’s mission of harnessing AI to enhance data-driven security 
operations aligns perfectly with my professional background and passion for innovative 
technologies. 
In my enterprise initiatie of HomeSmartify.lu, I developed of AI-powered dialogue 
systems, fine-tuning LLMs like Mistral 7B and implementing Retrieval Augmented 
Generation (RAG) techniques. I developed AI-driven webscrawler which combines the 
advantage of CSS selector and LLM, also use LLM API to further evaluate and sumamrize 
the text for newsletter and designed the HTML interface, showcasing my proficiency 
in TypeScript, React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Prior to this, at KPMG Luxembourg, I 
improved fund reconciliation processes by 30% through robust backend 
solutions.My DevOps experience at Whalecloud Technology ensures that I can deliver 
scalable, stable code in production environments. 
I strongly believe that interdisciplinary knowledge is key to harnessing AI’s full potential. 
My MBA in Blockchain & Big Data, supported by a scholarship for my proposal on 
integrating AI and Web3 technologies for IT compliance automation, reflects my dedication 
to merging technical solutions with practical business needs. Delivering this project 
demonstrated my resilience and commitment to achieving impactful results. 
What excites me most about Elastic is the opportunity to work with a diverse, distributed 
team on solutions that directly enhance security workflows through generative AI. I am 
eager to bring my experience in developing scalable AI solutions, collaborating across teams, 
and contributing to open-source initiatives to help Elastic deliver cutting-edge security 
features. 
Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of contributing to 
Elastic’s mission of transforming data-driven decision-making with innovative AI solutions. 
Best regards, 
Ruiqi Tan 
rickytan79386@gmail.com | +352 661777082
